snippet: Lawyers began questioning potential jurors for the trial of the man accused of killing 12 people and wounding 70 during a showing of a Batman movie in 2012.
abstract: Lawyers start questioning potential jurors for trial of James E Holmes, accused of killing 12 people and wounding 70 in Aurora, Colo, movie theater in 2012; district attorney is seeking death penalty and much of questioning of potential jurors focuses on their opinions about capital punishment.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers began questioning potential jurors for the trial of the man accused of killing 12 people and wounding 70 during a showing of a Batman movie in 2012.

headline.main: Jury Pool for Trial in Aurora Shooting Is Pressed on Death Penalty
headline.print_headline: In Aurora Case, Jury Pool Is Pressed on Death Penalty
